Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was deemed to be very wealthy in view of his great number of buffaloes, whom he looked after very diligently.

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The woman fell in love with one herdsman and lost all her senses.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਸ਼ਰੀਰ (ਅਥਵਾ ਘਰ) ਦੀ ਸਾਰੀ ਸੁਧ ਬੁਧ ਭੁਲ ਗਈ।
ਉਹ ਉਸ ਨਾਲ ਹਰ ਰੋਜ਼ ਭੋਗ ਕਰਦੀ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She would go across the stream everyday and come back after making love.(3)

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She would go across the stream everyday and come back after making love.(3)

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: One day Dogar got the wind of this and instantly followed her.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਤੁਰਤ ਇਸਤਰੀ ਦਾ ਪਿਛਾ ਕੀਤਾ।
ਜਾ ਕੇ ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਕਾਮ-ਕ੍ਰੀੜਾ ਕਰਦਿਆਂ ਵੇਖਿਆ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: When he saw her revelling in sex-play, he flew into a rage.(4)

lines.gurmukhi: kir kir kyil soie qy gey ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Luxuriating so excitingly they fell into sleep and became unaware of environs.

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: When she saw her friend without head, she became furious.

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She took out a sword and went round to annihilate anyone coming her way.(7)

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: When Dogar requested the woman to do him a favour,(10)
